mapper.select: SELECT ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM BOOK ) AS BOOK_CNT , ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM LEND ) AS LEND_CNT , ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM BUCKET_BOOK ) AS BUCKET_CNT , ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM REVIEW ) AS REVIEW_CNT FROM DUAL
SELECT CTGY , b.ctgy_nm , a.ctgy_cnt FROM ( SELECT SUBSTR(CTGY_ID,0,1) CTGY , COUNT(1) AS ctgy_cnt FROM BOOK GROUP BY SUBSTR(CTGY_ID,0,1) ) A , category b WHERE a.ctgy||'00' = b.ctgy_id ORDER BY CTGY

SELECT BCNFM_ST_CD , S.SCODE_NM as BCNFM_ST_NM , BCNFM_ST_CNT, ( select count(1) from BOOK_CONFIRM ) as bcnfm_st_all FROM ( SELECT BCNFM_ST_CD , COUNT(BCNFM_ST_CD) AS BCNFM_ST_CNT FROM ( SELECT A.BOOK_ID , A.BCNFM_ST_CD FROM BOOK_CONFIRM A , ( SELECT BOOK_ID , MAX(BCNFM_ID) AS BCNFM_ID FROM BOOK_CONFIRM GROUP BY BOOK_ID ) B WHERE A.BOOK_ID = B.BOOK_ID AND A.BCNFM_ID = B.BCNFM_ID ) GROUP BY BCNFM_ST_CD ) TEMP , SCODES S WHERE TEMP.BCNFM_ST_CD = S.SCODE AND S.LCODE = 'BC'

SELECT MONTHS , ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM BOOK where to_char(ins_dt , 'yyyymm') = months ) AS BOOK_CNT , ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM LEND where to_char(ins_dt , 'yyyymm') = months ) AS LEND_CNT , ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM BUCKET_BOOK where to_char(ins_dt , 'yyyymm') = months ) AS BUCKET_CNT , ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM REVIEW where to_char(ins_dt , 'yyyymm') = months ) AS REVIEW_CNT , ( select count(1) from book_confirm where to_char(ins_dt , 'yyyymm') = months ) as bcnfm_cnt FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE( to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')||'01', 'YYYYMM'), LEVEL - 1 ),'YYYYMM') AS MONTHS FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= MONTHS_BETWEEN( TO_DATE(to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')||'12', 'YYYYMM' ), TO_DATE(to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')||'01', 'YYYYMM' ) ) + 1 ) A
